attributes.action:
Leave!
We must leave the EU on April 12th
attributes.additional_details: Any longer extension would be a continued betrayal of the biggest democratic vote in our history.
attributes.background:
On June 23 2016, the British people voted to leave the EU.
Recently, Parliament voted to postpone Brexit until April 12 or May 22 (subject to the Withdrawal Agreement passing).
As there is little chance of the WA passing at all, we must leave the EU on April 12th.
